NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.name: NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST
NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.cause: Fill in the cause of the test fail.
NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.treatment: Fill in the recommendation for fixing the fail.

NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected high variation between microservice's sizes.
NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend reconsidering the sizes of the microservices.
NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service A" has 34 nanoentities.
Service "Service B" has 43 nanoentities.
Service "Service C" has 4 nanoentities.

ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected an abnormally high variation between entities counts per microservice.
ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend reconsidering the sizes of the microservices.
ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service A" has 3 entities.
Service "Service B" has 5 entities.
Service "Service C" has 1 entities.

RESPONSIBILITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: RESPONSIBILITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
RESPONSIBILITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected an acceptable variation between the use-cases counts per microservice.
RESPONSIBILITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend revising the use cases.
RESPONSIBILITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service C" has 2 use cases.
Service "Service B" has 8 use cases.
Service "Service A" has 6 use cases.
